original_text: Behold, therefore I have stretched out my hand over thee, and have diminished thine ordinary food, and delivered thee unto the will of them that hate thee, the daughters of the Philistines, which are ashamed of thy lewd way.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 내 손을 네 위에 펴서 네 일용할 양식을 감하고 너를 미워하는 블레셋 여자 곧 네 더러운 행실을 부끄러워하는 자에게 너를 넘겨 임의로 하게 하였거늘

sentences.original_text: therefore I have stretched out my hand over thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 내 손을 너 위에 펼쳤고

sentences.original_text: and have diminished thine ordinary food
and delivered thee unto the will of them that hate thee
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 너를 미워하는 자들의 뜻에 넘겨주었나니

sentences.original_text: which are ashamed of thy lewd way
